recipes.label: A Sky Clear as Diamonds
recipes.startdescription: Certain sights are only reserved for hermits and explorers. Tonight the sky is black velvet overlayed with an affluance of stars. There is nothing to gain or lose here, just a chance to marvel in delight.

recipes.label: Quiet Stargazing
recipes.startdescription: I sit on the back of the deck, and trust the running of the ship completely to the crew. I simply enjoy a peaceful moment with the cold far twinkling of the stars.

recipes.label: A Sparkle Retained
recipes.startdescription: Something of that candlelight glimmer has gotten caught in my eyes. The stars still dance in echoes on my retina, and I am sure those sensitive to this will be able to see them glimmer.
